name: Heavy Fall
description:
Controls

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys. Attack with Left mouse button and Special with Right mouse button.

Description

A simple wave based game, where you try to survive as long as possible.

You're on an elevator that keeps on going down. But you're not alone. Enemies will jump on the elevator to kill you! But that's not all. When an enemy lands on the elevator, the elevator will drop down faster depending on their weight. Some enemies are heavier than others.

Every 200th "Depth", an event starts for 20 sec.

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/heavy-fall
